sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.services

Class ServiceAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.services.ServiceAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.Listener, ServiceListener

    public abstract class ServiceAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceListener
    An abstract adapter class for a ServiceListener interface. The methods in this class are empty. This class exists as convenience for creating service listener objects.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell
    See Also:
    ServiceListener
